about_the_game:
Transfrom into the monsters you kill!

Project Morph is an isometric, souls-like, sci-fi action RPG.
Collect Enemy DNA and use it to transform yourself into various creatures, called MORPHS.

In this demo you'll get a glimpse of our combat and transformation mechanics.
Fight your way through a short level and beat the boss or try out new tactics and combos in the arena mode.

Become your enemy, literally, and fight fire with fire!

content_descriptors.notes:
Trigger-Warning: Violence

Project Morph contains violence against non-human, alien looking creatures. Violent acts include shooting, killing, decapacitation and potentially other gore-y content.

The elements mentioned above are depicted in a non-realistic and bright, colorful art style.
